author: Jon Brodkin
title: Google sues people who “weaponized” DMCA to remove rivals’ search results
description: Google says DMCA fraudsters filed copyright takedown notices for 600,000+ URLs.

author: Kevin Purdy
title: Tumblr is reportedly on life support as its latest owner reassigns staff
description: "600+ person-years of effort" have not stopped the site from losing $30M a year.
content:
Enlarge/ "You'll never be bored again" is one of the more fitting slogans attached to Tumblr.
